Package com.amit506.mongosearch

Class MongoSearchQueryBuilder.CriteriaDocumentBuilder

java.lang.Object
com.amit506.mongosearch.MongoSearchQueryBuilder.CriteriaDocumentBuilder
Enclosing class:
MongoSearchQueryBuilder
public static class MongoSearchQueryBuilder.CriteriaDocumentBuilder extends Object
CriteriaBuilder is responsible for converting a flat infix list of SearchTokens (representing logical query expressions) into a Document used in MongoDB Atlas Search.

It performs the following four steps:

  1. Infix Token Collection: Gather a flat list of tokens including operands (criteria), operators (AND/OR/MUST/NOT), and parentheses to define the logical expression.
  2. Infix to Postfix Conversion: Convert the infix token list to postfix (Reverse Polish Notation) using operator precedence and proper parenthesis handling.
  3. AST Generation: Build an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) from the postfix tokens, where each node represents a logical operation or operand.
  4. MongoDB Document Construction: Traverse the AST and convert it into a valid MongoDB Atlas Search query Document.

  • Method Details

    • build

      public org.bson.Document build()

    • infixToPostfix

      public static List<SearchToken> infixToPostfix(List<SearchToken> tokens)
      Converts an infix list of SearchTokens into a postfix list using the Shunting Yard algorithm.

      Example: Input: [A, MUST, (, B, SHOULD, C, )] Output: [A, B, C, SHOULD, MUST]

      Parameters:
      tokens - The infix list of SearchTokens.
      Returns:
      The postfix list of SearchTokens.

    • postfixToAst

      public static com.amit506.mongosearch.AstNode postfixToAst(List<SearchToken> postfixTokens)
      Builds an Abstract Syntax Tree (AST) from a list of postfix SearchTokens. This tree structure represents the logical hierarchy of the query.

      Example: Input: [A, B, C, SHOULD, MUST] Output: MUST(A, SHOULD(B, C))

      Parameters:
      postfixTokens - A list of SearchTokens in postfix order.
      Returns:
      The root of the constructed AST.
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - if the postfix expression is invalid.

    • appendMustToken

      public static List<SearchToken> appendMustToken(List<SearchToken> tokens, SearchCriteria criteria)
      Appends a single SearchCriteria as a MUST group to the provided SearchToken list. Returns a new list with the appended group.
      Parameters:
      tokens - the original list of SearchToken
      criteria - the SearchCriteria to append as a MUST group
      Returns:
      a new List with the MUST group appended
